name: 异世界无厘头生活2
description:
Approximate plot

You traveled to the other world a sexy big sister woke you up.
Tell you become the other world of the brave village recently attacked by the Slime
You need to protect the village through their own ingenuity to defeat the Slime Daemon.

How to play

Make the right choice by talking to the game characters
Collect props in the scene and buy them from the sage to make good use of them
Drive the plot development to finally defeat the Slime.

Game Tips

1 at the beginning of the dialogue with the goddess into the trial maid link trial to get the whip
2 at home to get apples, applesauce, and perfume (items will have a circle of yellow light very easy to find)
3 sleep to see Sukur to take out the apple to enter the plot to use the applesauce it applesauce into an empty cup
4 in Sukur here to enter the store to buy defense and money
5 wake up and choose the artifact to go to Luna's house for the first time choose to praise Luna's father for the second time choose to send perfume to enter the plot
6 stay overnight and enter the plot using empty cups filled with milk to go home you can get the axe and enter the milk plot
7 sleep to see Sukur to buy money and artifact design drawings wake up back to their rooms
8 then choose to play go to the brothel to choose heavy small and pro flavor big into the plot to get a vibrator and wire and then go home
9 home and click on the synthesis scroll to synthesize the artifact
10 synthesis after you can go to defeat the Slime
(If you accidentally die, you can return to Sukur where to let the time back to the morning resurrection but this is a limit to the number of resurrections)

Characters

Luna your exclusive maid big breasts natural dull you want to do what you want
Goddess gentle big sister to send you benefits
Great Sage Sukur your brain in the old grandfather to send you props pointing you to defeat the Slime

Game Features

Strange prop usage
You can touch the character's breast when talking
